CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unqualified: For candidates who do not meet the requirements - New: Newly added candidates, not yet evaluated - On hold: Process temporarily paused, for example, due to changes in priorities - Qualified: They have passed the initial evaluation and meet the basic requirements - Screening: Pending a Qualification Interview - Technical Test: Carrying out technical tests necessary for the position - Interviewing: In interviews, after passing the technical test - Referrals: Awaiting for referrals
CustomField.label: Candidate Status
